official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for additional copies of "The Federal Civilian Employee Loyalty Program," House Report No. 92-1637, 92d Congress, second session.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of six hundred additional copies of a report entitled "The Federal Civilian Employee Loyalty Program", House Report Numbered 92-1637, Ninety-second Congress, second session, for the use of the Committee on Internal Security.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for additional copies of "The Federal Civilian Employee Loyalty Program," House Report No. 92-1637, 92d Congress, second session.
